alert.note: Alert for Box Elder (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 20 at 6:44PM MDT until July 20 at 7:30PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: The National Weather Service in Salt Lake City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Box Elder County in northern Utah... * Until 730 PM MDT * At 644 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 22 miles northeast of Montello, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Box Elder County. This includes Utah Route 30 between mile markers 7 and 26. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
